name: Next.js GCS Signed URL
description: Generate a signed URL for Google Cloud Storage in a Route Handler.

files.template:
import { Storage } from '@google-cloud/storage';
export async function GET(){ const storage = new Storage(); const [url] = await storage.bucket(process.env.GCS_BUCKET!).file('upload.bin').getSignedUrl({ action:'write', expires: Date.now()+5*60*1000, contentType: 'application/octet-stream' }); return Response.json({ url }); }
